text: atan mel nampikkai kollatavarkal, ataipparri avacarappatukinranar anal nampikkai kontavarkal atanai (ninaittu) payappatukirarkal; niccayamaka atu unmaiye enpatai avarkal arikirarkal; arintu kolka avvelai kurittu evarkal vinvatam ceytu kontirukkirarkalo avarkal netiya valikettileye irukkirarkal
